overview_of_class: Building from a base of strong reporting, students will learn narrative interviewing techniques, in-depth reporting and story development tactics for producing magazine-styled feature stories. Culminating with a lengthy story, students will learn how to craft beautifully reported and written pieces, understand the basics of tone, voice and narrative structure as well as how to get such stories pitched and published. The course emphasizes in-depth storytelling skills and is appropriate for students who are pursuing magazine, news reporting, documentary film, investigative, and interactive skills.?
name: Feature & Magazine Writing
subject: JOUR
